defines.brief: Define this preprocessor symbol to enable optional support for Google Log (GLOG).
defines.details:
NOTE: when using Conan to install Batteries in a downstream project, this shouldn't be defined directly; instead add the following to the downstream `conanfile.py`:

```python

def configure(self):
    ...
    self.options["batteries"].with_glog = True
```
defines.name: BATT_WITH_GLOG
defines.summary: Define this preprocessor symbol to enable optional support for Google Log (GLOG).
defines.title: BATT_WITH_GLOG

defines.brief: Define this preprocessor symbol to enable optional support for Google Protocol Buffers (protobuf).
defines.details:
NOTE: when using Conan to install Batteries in a downstream project, this shouldn't be defined directly; instead add the following to the downstream `conanfile.py`:

```python

def configure(self):
    ...
    self.options["batteries"].with_protobuf = True
```
defines.name: BATT_WITH_PROTOBUF
defines.summary: Define this preprocessor symbol to enable optional support for Google Protocol Buffers (protobuf).

defines.brief: Enables BATT_ASSERTs explicitly (instead of inferring from -DNDEBUG)
defines.details:
NOTE: when using Conan to install Batteries in a downstream project, this shouldn't be defined directly; instead add the following to the downstream `conanfile.py`:

```python

def configure(self):
    ...
    self.options["batteries"].with_asserts = True
```
defines.name: BATT_WITH_ASSERTS
defines.summary: Enables BATT_ASSERTs explicitly (instead of inferring from -DNDEBUG)
